headline: Has Lam Research Run Too Far After 97% Surge in 2025?
summary: Thinking about whether Lam Research stock is actually worth its current price? You are not alone. A closer look at its valuation reveals some surprises most investors overlook. Despite a slight 0.6% dip in the past month and a double-digit 11.3% pullback over the last week, Lam Research’s share price has soared an incredible 97.7% year-to-date and 106.6% over the last year, showing that market sentiment is anything but dull. This momentum comes in the context of sector-wide interest as...
